thread.title: Trudeau's fashion raises eyebrows on India trip

title: Trudeau's fashion raises eyebrows on India trip
text:
Trudeau's fashion raises eyebrows on India trip 2:19pm GMT - 01:18 
Trudeau family’s ornate traditional Indian attire raised eyebrows during their trip to the country, with the prime minister at one point donning formal wear typically worn by bridegrooms. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
